overview:
Pavan Kumar Rao Navule is currently working as Software Engineer at Virtusa and also the Founder of LeaseDedo.com a website specially designed by him where registered users can Post Lease offers related to AdSpace, Automobile, Business and Property for Free.

He comes from the family of strong Business background. His father is a Great Business man. In his childhood, Pavan used to sell clothes by visiting his father’s Cloth ShowRoom in his free times. All of his primary education was completed in his home town Tadpatri, a small town located in Anantapur District of Andhra Pradesh, India.

He completed his graduation in Bachelors of Technology in the field of Electronics & Communication Engineering in the year 2010.

He is the winner of the “BHARAT RATNA SIR MOKSHAGUNDAM VISVESVARAYA BEST ESSAY AWARD’09” in the year 2009 for his writings on “Engineering Solutions to Combat Climate Changes” which was conducted among all the Engineering Colleges in Andhra Pradesh, India.
